scripts:
set ACL for anf-page-service
	allow jcr:read on /etc/age
end

set ACL for anf-page-service
	allow jcr:read,rep:write,jcr:readAccessControl,jcr:modifyAccessControl on /content/anf-code-challenge/us/en
end

set ACL for anf-page-service
	allow jcr:read,rep:write,jcr:readAccessControl,jcr:modifyAccessControl on /var/anf-code-challenge
end
